title: Has anyone here ever used the Hextech skin rental?
body:
I was having another look at my collection and noticed that little option again. It honestly seems like such a waste. You get a skin for "free", but only seven days. Since skin shards are so difficult to come by, there's no guarantee you'll get that same skin shard you want, and chances are, if you liked it enough to rent it, you'll want it permanently. 

I feel like it should be changed to "you get to have a one-game free trial for this skin for X Orange Essence", and have it be an actual rental system where you get to see if you like the skin or not.
